appDesc.message: A temporary tabs holding and management. The new designed UI enhance the interaction and practicability of this extension.

displayModeTooltips.message: Display mode in popup page: Grid or List.

closeTabAfterTinTooltips.message: We will close all the tabs in the chrome window as soon as you tin them.

openTabsInNewWindowTooltips.message: If enabled, all the tabs will be open in a totally new Google Chrome window.

automaticallySendUsageStatisticsTooltips.message: If enabled, it will send anonymous data to the remote server in the background, such as the version of your Google Chrome, the version of Tinning, operation platform and the total numbers of tinned and un-tinned tabs. We will not collect your personal data.

scrollToTheLastPositionAfterUnTinTabs.message: Scroll to the last position after un-Tin tabs

scrollToTheLastPositionAfterUnTinTabsToo.message: If enabled, the page will scroll to the position where you tinned it before.

feedbackFeildsEmptyMsg.message: Sorry! Please fill in both fields.

feedbackSuccessMsg.message: Thanks for your feedback, I'll read it in detail and reply you ASAP!.

feedbackFailureMsg.message: Sorry! Something wrong happened, it's definitely my mistake.
